verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H1481>abide<s%> in your <S%H168>tabernacle?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill?<s%>
He that <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly,<s%> and <S%H6466>works<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaks<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

He that <S%H7270>backbites<s%> not with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5375>takes<s%> up a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H7138>neighbor.<s%>

In whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a <S%H959>vile<s%> person is <S%H959>contemned;<s%> but he <S%H3513>honors<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> He that <S%H7650>swears<s%> to his own <S%H7489>hurt,<s%> and <S%H4171>changes<s%> not.

He that <S%H5414>puts<s%> not out his <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H5392>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent.<s%> He that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
